resources.string: Chest pain, shortness of breath, palpitations, light headedness or fainting, swelling in the legs or ankles
Persistent headaches, seizures, memory loss, difficulty with speech or movement, vision problems
Unexplained weight loss, fatigue, persistent cough or hoarseness, abnormal bleeding, changes in bowel or bladder habits
High fever, persistent vomiting or diarrhea, difficulty breathing, ear pain or discharge, unexplained rash
Abnormal bleeding, pelvic pain or pressure, changes in menstrual patterns, breast lumps or discharge, urinary incontinence
